languages.text: {n}Техножрец поднимает на Джай непонимающий взгляд.{/n} "Брезгливость — не актуальный фактор. Риск духовного ущерба оценен как приемлемый. Важность получения информации — критическая".

traits.locale_text: {n}Техножрец поднимает на Джай непонимающий взгляд.{/n} "Брезгливость — не актуальный фактор. Риск духовного ущерба оценен как приемлемый. Важность получения информации — критическая".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}The Tech-Priest raises his uncomprehending gaze to Jae.{/n} "Squeamishness is not a relevant factor. I have conducted the relevant assessments: the risk of spiritual harm is acceptable; the importance of obtaining the information is critical."

languages.text: {n}这位技术神甫看了婕伊一眼，目光中满是不解。{/n}“精神洁癖并不是相关因素。我已经进行了相关的评估，精神伤害方面的风险也是可以接受的。获取信息才是最重要的事情。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest raises his uncomprehending gaze to Jae.{/n} "Squeamishness is not a relevant factor. I have conducted the relevant assessments: the risk of spiritual harm is acceptable; the importance of obtaining the information is critical."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位技术祭司看了卡西娅一眼，目光中满是不解。{/n}“精神洁癖并不是相关因素。我已经进行了相关的评估，精神伤害方面的风险也是可以接受的。获取信息才是最重要的事情。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}El tecnosacerdote fija su mirada incomprensiva en Jae.{/n} «La aprensión no es un factor relevante. He realizado las evaluaciones relevantes: el riesgo de daños espirituales es aceptable y la importancia de obtener la información es crucial».
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest raises his uncomprehending gaze to Jae.{/n} "Squeamishness is not a relevant factor. I have conducted the relevant assessments: the risk of spiritual harm is acceptable; the importance of obtaining the information is critical."

traits.locale_text: {n}El tecnosacerdote fija su mirada incomprensiva en Cassia.{/n} «La aprensión no es un factor relevante. He realizado las evaluaciones relevantes: el riesgo de daños espirituales es aceptable y la importancia de obtener la información es crucial».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}技術司祭は理解しがたい視線をジェイに向ける。{/n}「恐ろしさは重要な要素ではありません。自分は関連する評価を行った。結果、精神的被害のリスクは許容範囲内であり、情報を得ることの重要性は極めて重要と算定されました」
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest raises his uncomprehending gaze to Jae.{/n} "Squeamishness is not a relevant factor. I have conducted the relevant assessments: the risk of spiritual harm is acceptable; the importance of obtaining the information is critical."

traits.locale_text: {n}技術司祭は理解しがたい視線をジェイに向ける。{/n}「恐ろしさは重要な要素ではありません。自分は関連する評価を行った。結果、精神的被害のリスクは許容範囲内であり、情報を得ることの重要性は極めて重要と算定されました」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Techpriester blickt verständnislos zu Jae auf.{/n} "Empfindlichkeit ist kein relevanter Faktor. Ich habe die relevanten Einschätzungen vorgenommen: Das Risiko eines spirituellen Schadens ist akzeptabel, aber die Informationen zu erhalten, ist unerlässlich."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest raises his uncomprehending gaze to Jae.{/n} "Squeamishness is not a relevant factor. I have conducted the relevant assessments: the risk of spiritual harm is acceptable; the importance of obtaining the information is critical."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Techpriester blickt verständnislos zu Cassia auf.{/n} "Empfindlichkeit ist kein relevanter Faktor. Ich habe die relevanten Einschätzungen vorgenommen: Das Risiko eines spirituellen Schadens ist akzeptabel, aber die Informationen zu erhalten, ist unerlässlich."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le technoprêtre regarde Jae d'un air indiquant clairement qu'il ne comprend pas.{/n} « Le dégoût n'est pas un facteur applicable. J'ai effectué les évaluations nécessaires : l'obtention d'informations est d'une importance capitale, pour un risque de dommage spirituel acceptable. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest raises his uncomprehending gaze to Jae.{/n} "Squeamishness is not a relevant factor. I have conducted the relevant assessments: the risk of spiritual harm is acceptable; the importance of obtaining the information is critical."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le technoprêtre regarde Cassia d'un air indiquant clairement qu'il ne comprend pas.{/n} « Le dégoût n'est pas un facteur applicable. J'ai effectué les évaluations nécessaires : l'obtention d'informations est d'une importance capitale, pour un risque de dommage spirituel acceptable. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip, boş bakışlarını Jae'a çeviriyor.{/n} "Hassasiyet, durumla ilintili bir etken değil. İlintili bulgularım şu yönde: Ruhani hasar görme tehlikesi makul derecede, bilgiye ulaşmanın önemi ise son derece yüksek."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest raises his uncomprehending gaze to Jae.{/n} "Squeamishness is not a relevant factor. I have conducted the relevant assessments: the risk of spiritual harm is acceptable; the importance of obtaining the information is critical."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tekno Rahip, boş bakışlarını Jae’ye çeviriyor.{/n} “Utangaçlık, durumla ilintili bir etken değil. İlintili bulgularım şu yönde: Ruhani hasar görme tehlikesi makul derecede; bilgiye ulaşmanın önemi son derece yüksek.”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
